entry.title: Interesing Thingys 27
entry.content:
What a week! Here comes a massive link bomb, behold!

JavaScript

  • Build Cross Browser Extensions with JavaScript & jQuery - Crossrider.com

  • Asynchronous JavaScript Testing in Jasmine, Mocha, and Vows | The Carbon Emitter

  • Automating Unit Tests | Blog | Sencha
  • jQuery Geo - JavaScript mapping API
  • Scaling node.js to 100k concurrent connections! | caustik's blog
  • justGage.com - JustGage is a handy JavaScript plugin for generating and animating nice & clean gauges.
  • Leak Finder: a new tool for JavaScript - Google Open Source Blog
  • Getting Bitwise with JavaScript - Bocoup
  • Managing JavaScript on Responsive Websites | Viget

    swank-js provides SLIME REPL and other development tools

CSS

Miscellaneous

    Rob explains the origin of dot files

  • ircmaxell's blog: Reinvent The Wheel!
  • Halide

Security

  • Troy Hunt: Lessons in website security anti-patterns by Tesco

SPDY

  • SPDY and WebSockets | The CTO's Blog

Hacking

    Writing for hackers
